worst purchase i ve made  i bought this in march for my daughter  but because of the pandemic it was in storage until she moved out in the fall  when she finally opened it  it did not work at all  since i was past the return deadline  i tried working directly with the manufacturer  they sent me a new cord which turned on the power  but only produced a high pitch whining sound  very disappointed that they would not follow up  we re out the full cost with no option i know of except throwing it in the trash  such a disappointment

i love this victrola record player  i m so happy to be able to play my record collection now  it s a beautiful player and it works great  the sound is ok  but you can add speakers if you want to  bluetooth speakers will work if they have an auxilary input  the player does not send bluetooth signals but will receive  like from your phone   extra note  the autostop works perfect with albums  big records  but stops a little too soon with some   s  small records   but there is an off on switch for this  so put it off while playing   s  it seems to be well made and i m very happy with it  it comes with an extra needle and if you register it on victrola com registration with the model number and serial number  they will even send you another replacement needle as a gift   at least they are doing that at the moment lol  it s always good to have backups

got this for my husband for christmas  he absolutely loves it  i was able to play my led zeppelin vinyl albums i haven t heard in over    years  now in the evenings we have something to talk about because he plays his new portable turntable and all the old classics from the   s   s and   s that we loved  thank you for creating this wonderful piece of nostalgia for us

the sound of this awful machine is an insult to recorded sound   it s pretty difficult for a scratchy  old    from     years ago to sound worse than it does on an actual     year old acoustic victrola  but this item fits the bill do not confuse this with the excellent product now being produced by the successor to the victor company  who is now producing american made phonographs in camden  nj under the victrola label

if i had written this review when i first received this turntable  the review would have been glowing it was a warehouse bargain but the only noted damage was to the box i ve been using this for a little over a month  a few hours a week when i work from my home office  and it has already stopped working  it will no longer turn on i m so disappointed  this was a birthday present to myself so that i could enjoy the vinyl records i ve been collecting for years without having to fire up our big stereo system  there should have been way more than a month of service for the price i paid  it s worth spending a little extra to get a nicer  more recognized brand it s so unfortunate that i m out of the return window and stuck with just a little red suitcase

i love the design and the functionality of this as a speaker  but as a record player  it is terrible  most of my records don t play without skipping  and it is especially true with records that are newer releases or have any coloring to the vinyl  but even older vinyl has issues  too  i do not own a single record that plays without skipping on this machine   but all is not lost   it does work really well as a speaker  and it is usually very easy to connect to devices via bluetooth  but i didn t buy this to use as a speaker   i bought it as a record player  and it absolutely fails at that

the record player i used previously has issues playing some of my heavier weighted records  but this player handles the heavy records very easily  in addition to that  i hadn t noticed  when i purchased the player  the little switch or lever that moves the tone arm over the record and slowly drops it into place  that was a nice surprise since i always have issues dropping the needle accidentally  the color of the suitcase is just as advertised  the speakers are good quality  but can have some unpleasant fuzz when the sound is turned too loud or a particularly intense part of the record is playing  the music coming out of the speakers is soft and creates a nice ambiance in my room  i would definitely purchase this player again and recommend it to those looking to purchase one  regardless if you re a a novice or experienced record listener  this player will satisfy  it comes with a replacement needle  power cord  and    adapter

this is really  really not a quality record player   i understand why people are drawn to it   the case is really nice looking in a vintage way  and it s cool to think that you re tapping into the long history of victrola   the sound is ok for what it is  when it works unfortunately  that name is all this player has to do with victrola   the player uses a needle and turntable assembly that is very  very cheap and low quality and is used in almost  all  portable suitcase players    there are videos out about this if you look around    mine worked fine for about two months  and then decided to stop spinning records at the right speeds   if you have any experience with record players you can tell how flimsy it is when you use it   also  this doesn t have bluetooth connectivity in the sense that you can use a bluetooth speaker with the player   it means that you can use the speakers on the player with one of your other devices like a phone or a laptop if you want something portable  there are much more reputable companies out there making much better players in the low     s

this is a great little record player plays my records without any problems or scratches build quality is better than i expected quick bluetooth connection front speakers arent too bad  they re loud but    although the bluetooth connection is almost immediate  it does lack low end  bass  when streaming music vs a record not a deal breaker though  the only con i have found is when speakers are connected to the back ports   the front speakers are still active and audible  came with a replacement needle and    adapter when needed i highly recommend this record player for anyone of all ages  and will be purchasing another in the near future for the family room

i ordered this product and it was sent back by usps because the box was so damaged  amazon gave me a quick and full refund  so i ordered the product a second time because i like the way it looks and really wanted to play my records  when the product arrived today  the second time  it was not in a protective box  just the actual product box with a bunch of packaging tape on it which was clearly covering up a huge hole in the box  when i opened the box the product looked fine  it actually looked cool  i read the directions and plugged it in  and turned it on   the  on  light came on but when i went to put the tone arm on the record the turn table wouldn t spin at all  there was nothing plugged into the aux in out so that wasn t the problem and the belt was on fine  i assume it is a motor issue  anyhow im sending it back now

i ve always wanted one of these small record players  so after seeing the very reasonable price on this one i decided to try it out  the sound is amazing for the size of the speakers  and the slight crackle just adds another layer of vintage to whatever you re listening to  it s very easy to use  and the color is stunning  overall  it s a fantastic little record player and i could recommend it to anyone who s never owned a record player and doesn t really know how to operate one  and it s super easy to find vintage records at antique shops for cheap  which just makes the whole deal even better

i own a dumont console record player    it stopped working awhile ago  needs to be looked at and see what s wrong with it  therefore  just wanted something inexpensive and decent to be able to listen to my records in the meantime   looked at many brands and saved countless on my amazon wishlist   there is actually another victrola player i want and probably will get   but let me tell you this little suitcase player works phenomenally well for the price point  i ordered the brown color only because it was cheaper    for what it is the sound is actually pretty good  i mostly like to listen on record players jazz singers and jazz music   and this little guy resonates the music really good   i was thinking of attaching my vintage speakers to it  but may not need too   i have it located in a small bedroom and fills the  room just fine   i read the reviews and many were mixed  figure  let me take a chance  for the price  you can t go wrong    my player arrived in perfect condition and packed nicely and everything works like it should   greatly satisfied with the product

i hate writing negative reviews on anything   truly   but i don t want anyone to make the same mistake that i made   i bought two of these   one for me and one for my mother in law hers came first   i set it up for her   she loved it then she came to me and said all of her records are skipping so she s going to have to only buy new records   i didn t think much of it as she has a very old collection that she hasn t looked at in    years i got mine   i played  or tried to play  a few brand new  never before played records  and most of them skipped   i brought them upstairs to my really nice expensive record player   they worked perfectly the problem seems to be in the player   i would not look at this one   per haps i did something wrong  but i can t imagine what i could have done sorry that this didn t work out

this was a gift for someone special  and it definitely was well received   i loved the fact that there is a large variety of colors and prints to choose from  and this british print was perfect   it plays vinyl very well  good sound quality  and we like the fact that we can use the bluetooth feature to play tunes from our phones   excellent product

started using this about three days now  it work just fine in the first two days  the sound quality isn t great but i can bare with it  but sometime the arm will not move but it will work   secs later  the three day suddenly there is those noises coming out from the speaker  and then some how i think i smelled smoke  i m not sure  i unplugged the power immediately  when i plug in again the next day  the speaker stop working  very disappointed  i was so happy to get this speaker when i ordered it

birthday gift for my son  did not power up out of the box   i verified  v dc coming from wall plug adapter   pulled inside panel  and the printed circuit board that has the power switch  bluetooth  headphone jack etc  doesn t even have the connector plugged in to provide power whoever assembled at fault i would suggest   the power cable was wrapped around another cord an laying close to where it should have been plugged in very disappointing   poor quality control

had it for   months and love it  i don t listen to may records  but it works well when i do use it for that  i ve found myself using it for the bluetooth speaker a lot  i take it to family get togethers for us to play music on  my whole family has asked where i got it and are really impressed when i tell them how inexpensive it was i m not a musician  so i m sure people have stuff to say about speaker quality  but to me  it seems really good i especially love how portable it is and how it looks like a decoration when i m not using it

it looks beautiful  very easy to use  sound quality is not at all what i thought it would be  i ve bought victrolas in the past and was therefore expecting it to sound clear  rich  and full  when i used it it sounded very tinny  muddled  and gravelly   as if someone threw sand into the speaker  hopefully you have a better experience than i  i thought i would be able to connect it to an external speaker  my alexa  via bluetooth so i could hear the vinyl quality but through different speakers   nope  the record player itself acts as an external speaker  though i recommend against it given the sound quality  and you cannot connect to bt and play your record at the same time

this is a good buy for under     if you aren t overly concerned with audio quality   however  i think most of us who buy this expecting it to be able to connect to bluetooth speakers are disappointed   the speakers are really poor   the bluetooth functions do not allow you to play the phonograph over bluetooth speakers as i believe most would expect   rather  the phonograph acts as a bluetooth speaker   and a poor one

this product looks really nice  but that s about it  as previously mentioned  the arm has no counterweight  so it will put too much pressure on the needle and scratch up your records  the turntable is made of thin plastic and extremely flimsy  my thicker   s were extremely wobbly on it  which could lead to damaging your records  the sound was pretty bad  i m not sure of the speaker quality was the problem or the cheap setup was the culprit for it  but the sound was fuzzy  the bluetooth does not allow you to play vinyl on other speakers  it allows you to use the record player speakers to play music from other devices  such as your phone  this is disappointing this thing is a nice decoration  but the low quality will end up ruining your records

this should be purchased for children only  it does not have quality sound  the speakers are very tinmy  and there s only one port for an additional speaker   we knew this before purchase  but to reiterate  it is bluetooth only in the sense that the tenny speakers will broadcast whatever you have playing on your phone or other device  not the reverse  it s a cheap little thing   i guess you get what you pay for   it turns records and functions even though amazon did not pack it within another box  the original packaging was beat all to hell  but the thing works anyway

do not waste your money  this is crap if your an audiophile and even worse for a beginner  the lid is prone to drop on the album  a simple locking hinge would have been a cheap fix  the needle is so bad that it s skipped constantly on the three new albums i played  the experience overall was disappointing i would not recommend at all

first off  my    year old loves this   it s her first experience with records and she doesn t seem to notice or care about the awful  tinny  distorted  low fi sound   i did plug it into an external powered computer speaker which helps some   so i guess this is ok as a starter turntable for a kid  but if you care even remotely  and i mean even the slightest  about sound quality  skip this model   it sounds about as good as a      s am transistor radio   it does look cute though

as soon as i got this turntable  it wasn t working  i tried a bunch of different records  old  new  different sizes  etc   and no matter what  it was skipping constantly  there is no way to balance the arm on the player  so i tried doing it myself with coins and small weights  still skipping  i tried changing the needle with the replacement they sent  still skipping  i contacted customer support for victrola and their advice to me was to attempt to balance the arms myself  as i had already tried   their advice is to tamper with their product in order for it to work  they sold a product that literally will not do the bare minimum  play music  without tampering with it using fishing weights i had to buy separately  they also told me it s not compatible with         gram records  i could not find that information anywhere in the product description before buying it  this is false advertising  i m waiting to hear back again from customer service about this  hopefully they will attempt to refund or replace the product but i m not sure they will considering they re already sneaky enough to sell a brand new product that is useless

its super cute looking and i think it d be good for a child but it skips a ton and slows down randomly and the whole thing is poorly constructed  i knew better because of the price but i don t listen to vinyl a ton so i thought it would be fine  not worth it  spend the money on a decent set up or just forget vinyl and stream youtube cuz the sound quality is so bad  vinyl isn t cheap so spend the money to get something decent

arrived fast and was in great condition  this was my first record player and the original needle it came with made the records skip  luckily they provide a backup with it and that needle works just fine   as for the speakers there are alot of mixed reviews  for a portable speaker they are pretty good  about as good as a mid grade phone or a     bluetooth speaker from walmart  if you are an audiophile looking for really good quality sound you need to have some of your own separate speakers to hook this up to  it has stereo plug ins on the back and i have it hooked up to an amp and it sounds great  if you don t care too much about sound quality and just want a cheap small record player i would definitely recommend this  the records wobble a little which i have heard is normal and doesn t affect the sound  for the average person this player is perfect but if you are looking for something high end that will be stationary in your room then you will need to spend way more than      personally i love it and use it all the time  the colors are very pretty too  perfect for a first time record player and would make a fantastic gift for anyone who enjoys listening to records

very nice for the price  i didn t think i would like the compactness of this product but actually do  it s so easy to pull out and entertain and put back on the shelf out of the way  nice sound and hooks to my phone with ease  turntable is smooth with no vibration  i d buy again

i realize you get what you pay for  but you would expect a record player would be able to do one fundamental thing   play records without them skipping   the sound quality  even through headphones  is pretty abysmal   my daughter loves the union jack design and puts up with the lo fi sound quality since this isn t her primary means of listening to music   it s more of a novelty because it s more decoration than anything else did we decide to keep it   she knows that if she wants something that actually works  she ll have to spend some real money

for the price  this is a very good buy sound quality is on the mediocre to poor side  could add some base for a much better audio experience  i m judging this against my parents old   very old record player that is     years old  not the new dolby digital  and the sound quality is much better than this new record player  twin speaker set up against twin speakers  my parents old system blows this one away for quality ease of use is great on this system  very adaptable seems to be made of good quality material but haven t had it for long so can t say anything concerning longevity my daughter loves it and that is the most important rating of all but for the money  i don t think you can go wrong with this i do recommend this product

it was very easy to set this record player up  and within minutes  we were listening to music   the sound produced by the built in speakers is pretty clear  and although some of the previous reviews recommend a slip mat  this doesn t seem necessary because the turntable has small rubber spots that hold the record in place   we also didn t have any issues regarding the records skipping as some of the other reviews pointed out   one thing to note is that the record player does seem very fragile  and needs to be handled with considerable care   in my opinion  this is definitely not something for children   however  even though it doesn t compare to my      gemini turntable  i wouldn t expect it to   it s a cool  relatively compact device to put in a place that your traditional record player set up may not fit

purchased this item for portability and easy  affordable access to playing vinyl records that i m quickly amassing from thrift stores and estate sales   price was very attractive and victrola brand is legendary  so thought i couldn t go wrong   novelty british flag design was an added plus received incorrect style of the item  no british flag rather  a solid  black velvet case    but nevertheless gave it a spin     of the    records i played skipped horribly   particularly on the first half of each side   i suspect it has something to do with the design          lp records actually extend out beyond the record platform and cabinet  so i think lack of stability underneath the vinyl is an issue   and results in needle kicking up   particularly if there is a slight warp to the record  which many vintage records have    returned the item and purchased another victrola model  vta     that has better support underneath lp s and so far have had no issues with skipping   all the records that skipped on this model didn t on the vta

i was a bit worried ordering this because the reviews are somewhat all over the place but was very relieved to find it works fantastically  looks good  sounds good  also works with bluetooth very easily  only things i can say for some of the reviews saying there was no proper sound is possibly getting a defective one or maybe they didn t take off the protective piece over the stylus  or needle  also make sure your records are dust free as bits of dust can create pops and crackles  oh i forgot to mention this thing can go pretty dang loud and thats awesome

so upset  ordered this as a christmas gift and when they put in the record the sound was horrible    it made the background music sound distorted and  wavy  anyways  i wouldn t recommend this  i m returning it and going with something different  i guess you get what you pay for  but really  what a piece of crap also  how embarrassing to give as a gift and hear that it is no good

this is good for anything   but a record  the motor does not keep up and it sounds bad  i still use it a decore and to play bluetooth but i rarely ever use it for my records but that s what i excepted from a cheap record player

i bought this for my niece for christmas  along with a few records  to pass along the vinyl bug  it worked   maybe too well  i definitely created a monster who will need to be fed with new records and musical equipment for the rest of her life  yay the price point should tell you that this is no technics       but if you re looking for a fun gift  a record player for someone just getting started with vinyl  or a supplemental player for yourself  that s also highly portable   you won t go wrong here  there are an abundance of great colors and designs to choose from  and the bluetooth option is nice  you can also supplement the sound with additional speakers if you d like  or use your headphones or earbuds  as always  you get what you pay for  but this is a decent value for the low price  one quick caveat   consider buying a decently sturdy slipmat  the felt  fabric  or cork piece that sits underneath the vinyl on most turntables  to use with this player   it doesn t come with one  i was lucky that i already had backups on hand to include with my niece s gift  because i was uncomfortable with putting vinyl directly on plastic  a slightly thicker slipmat seemed to provide the most stability to balance out the lower cost components with which these turntables are made  happy listening

i bought this because of all the good reviews   i have a pretty good collection  and want to be able to play in my office  away from my full stereo system   i know that suitcase players are the trash of the audio industry  but held out hope that i could get something small and convenient   every record skipped   i have brand new  unopened records that i wanted to give a first spin   flawless  no dust  nothing   skipping   no way to adjust anything with the arm   i dont want the possibility of damaging some of my vintage records  so i am returning this   will look into a system to put in my office instead of this portable option   dont waste your money   i should have known better

i gave a   star rating   why  because the value exceeds to price  you get the best bang for your buck  i ve brought it with me to the park and plugged it into my car  sound quality is      considering the size of the speaker but who is looking for deep bass anyway  the vinyls play well   i have it on an auto setting  this is a plug and play machine  no exterior speaker needed though you can plug them in  it also gives you an aux port to listen via headphones to get the full vinyl sound  great product updated    months later and my victorila has stopped working  it stopped spinning the records  won t be purchasing again  you get what you paid for

my wife was really looking forward to getting this bit of nostalgia and to look at it the product fulfilled her expectations  but the sound that came out of it was absolutely awful  tinny with no bass  in these days of tiny beautiful sounding speakers why the company couldn t be bothered to use a good speaker in its box was astounding when the  quality  of the speaker was discovered we thought we d try to use the bluetooth to run the sound through other better speakers and the bluetooth only allowed for receiving and not broadcasting  why would we want other system s sound coming through this awful speaker

not the worst record player out there for someone who is just starting off  but the problems with it will quickly make you upgrade  the sound quality is very tinny  which can be really nice on things like swing music to really give a retro feel  but when you ve just paid over     on an album you really want  then the sound is a problem  worse is the skipping  since there is no counterweight on the tone arm  this thing has a really bad tendency to skip  i had one     gram record play in about ten seconds because the tone arm skipped over the whole thing  if you do end up getting this  be ready with a quarter to place on the tone arm and glue or tape it in place  otherwise you ll be resetting it over and over again honestly  it s best to just save up and get something nicer

i had researched a number of players and selected this one because it was portable  had few parts that could break and there were a lot of positive reviews   judging by the look on my granddaughter s face when she opened her present  i would say it was well received   i was very glad i purchased this as my granddaughter and i spent quite some time setting it up and playing albums

nothing fancy but it does work well  has that slightly tinny sound that most of the small portable players had when i was a kid  can only play one record at a time  only issue was that i did not see anything in the instructions about removing the cover from the needle before attempting to play a record  unpack it  put an album on  remove the needle cover  white  release the tone arm  lift the lever to the back of the player next to the tone arm  gently move tone arm over to album  lower with lever and relax while you listen to some good ole elvis

really pleased with this  i bought this for my art studio space in our attic  it s perfect for that purpose  keep in mind that it is a suitcase record player and the speakers are what one would expect for a suitcase record player  not a wide range but a decent sound  if you re looking for a more dynamic sound  and lots of bass  then i would suggest finding some auxiliary speakers at the goodwill and hooking them up  the mechanics feel solid  the tone arm has some weight to it  bluetooth mode works seamlessly pleased as punch with this  i would buy it again in a heartbeat

i bought this because my old record player wasn t working  i was excited to have a portable record player that i could take back and forth from college  home  when i first got it i thought all of records were warped  everything kept skipping  some of my really old records will sound okay but any newer record skips large portions of each song  after days of trying to get the table to stop wobbling i decide to return it  save your money and your time  don t buy

i have a few big record players that are not very travel friendly  so  i decided to purchase this portable record player  i love it so much   it s very lightweight  the sound quality is excellent  it s also a bluetooth speaker  and connects easily i ve had this for awhile and it still plays excellently  not to mention  the map design is beautiful perfect for anyone

did not have a    adapter when unpacked   sound quality is substandard  very tinny  absolutely no bass  the blue tooth would not connect this reminds me of a toy record player i had as a kid  don t expect much and you ll be happy   yes it s portable  it will play records and you ll be able to hear them

for the price you do get a decent product  the onboard speakers adequately produce a vinyl sound but do not have a wide range to carry full high  mid  and low db clarity  the tone arm and stylus head are lightweight and will occasionally  float  across your vinyl  this sounds like you re missing skipping through the song  i do have a fix for this though    place a penny or nickel on the stylus head  this adds the extra weight needed to keep the needle in the groove and greatly increases clarity and accuracy while playing a vinyl

this victrola turntable is a simple  yet usable purchase for both the avid record collector and the casual vinyl listener  the turntable is easy to use  and comes with detailed and understandable directions  it is bluetooth enabled  for the times when you d rather listen to a song thats on your phone or tablet  as the description notes  it is portable   so you can turn it off  snap the top closed  and take it wherever an outlet is  with it s handy handle   this also makes it super convenient for storing  if you don t always have space for a turntable  it would easily fit under most beds  or stashed in the closet  however  do not worry   just because this model is simple  and storable    it still packs the same punch of nostalgia  the sound quality is good  and the table can be turned up loud enough to rock out to your favorite classics  i would recommend this item

makes for a cute decoration but unless you re just spinning some old dinky records you got at a yard sale for five dollars you need to invest in a better player  this model has no counterweight  no antiskate and a very small platter  since it hangs off the side the disk will end up bending as it s spun  so your records will be damaged  this is a guarantee  if that isn t enough because there isn t a counterweight the sound will be warbled and skipping  audio technica has a good one for a hundred bucks  just use theirs

updated review  nice features at price point  newly received  black  model arrived in good shape and has a feature that the blue one didn t    the volume power knob also turns on the bluetooth discovery function whereas the blue unit had a separate switch for the bluetooth  i like the black model s design  one less switch to break and more straightforward to sync   sound is good but not great  as expected from two small built in speakers   stereo sound is evident   i like that this model stops the turntable automatically when arm at end of record  no auto return of arm   another portable unit i have does not do this  solid four stars now for product  one start missing due to poor assembly on first model and inconvenience of needing replaced  unit very  plasticy   could have used more metal and less plastic on some parts to inspire confidence that it will last a long time   old review follows  ordered light blue model  arrived by prime as expected   box in decent shape  but the item arrived defective  poorly manufactured    one screw missing from top deck  one other screw had completely come out of top deck and was jammed under turntable  no evidence of shipping damage    my guess is screws were stripped when installed and simply fell out during shipping    though who knows where the second screw went     something heavy has come loose inside of the turntable cabinet and slides back and forth upon tipping  presumably once held in place by one or more of the same missing screws   the turntable functions well enough despite missing loose components  one speaker not working  that i m willing to give it another shot with a replacement    though the blue one is now backordered until after christmas  amazon customer support was great re  replacement options  trying again with a black one
